llm_text:
Why: The flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1) which substantially increased the model score. Additional increases came from dayofweek (value=6, i.e., Sunday), amount_received (13786.6), amount_paid (13786.6), and hour (12). These features collectively pushed the score upward. from_bank (2991) had a negative contribution and partially reduced the score but did not offset the positive drivers.

Conclusion: The model flagged an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) of 13,786.6 occurring at hour=12 on dayofweek=6; these factors dominated the risk signal despite a lowering effect from from_bank=2991. If further review is needed, focus on validating the ACH payment context and the Sunday/noon timing.
